mapper.select: SELECT * FROM THEATER_SCHEDULE TS JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE JOIN THEATER_ROOM TR ON TS.THEATER_ROOM_ID = TR.THEATER_ROOM_ID WHERE TS.THEATER_ROOM_ID IN ( SELECT THEATER_ROOM_ID FROM THEATER_ROOM WHERE THEATER_ID = #{theaterId} ) AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = #{todayDate} ORDER BY TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_START

SELECT TS.*, TR.THEATER_ROOM_NAME, M.MOVIE_TITLE, T.THEATER_NAME FROM THEATER_SCHEDULE TS JOIN THEATER_ROOM TR ON TS.THEATER_ROOM_ID = TR.THEATER_ROOM_ID JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE JOIN THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID WHERE TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = #{theaterId}

SELECT * FROM THEATER_SCHEDULE TS JOIN THEATER T ON TS.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID JOIN THEATER_ROOM TR ON TS.THEATER_ROOM_ID = TR.THEATER_ROOM_ID JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE WHERE TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = #{date} AND TS.THEATER_ID = #{theaterId} ORDER BY TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_END

SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_ACTORS, M.MOVIE_GENRE, M.MOVIE_RUNTIME, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_STAR, M.MOVIE_RELEASE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_STILL, NVL(CNT_TABLE.CNT, 0) MOVIE_SCHEDULE_CNT FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MOVIE_CODE, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM THEATER_SCHEDULE WHERE THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = #{date} GROUP BY MOVIE_CODE )) CNT_TABLE ON M.MOVIE_CODE = CNT_TABLE.MOVIE_CODE WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_DIBS MD JOIN MEMBER M ON MD.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{name}
